summary: AN ORDINANCE relating to the Olympic Sculpture Park, granting to the Seattle Art Museum permission to construct, maintain and operate two (2) skybridges for pedestrian access over and across: 1) Elliott Avenue between Bay Street and Broad Street, and 2) Alaskan Way between Bay Street and Broad Street, for a ten (10) year term, renewable for four (4) successive ten-year terms, specifying the conditions under which this permit is granted, and providing for acceptance of the permit and conditions.
